entry.title: the king's crown jewel
entry.summary:
Author: chnschromehrt

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,713Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 86

Summary: Felix stops walking right where they are, turning to Mingyu with a knowing look. Mingyu shakes his head, dropping his hand to his side and speaking lowly to Felix so his voice doesn’t carry down the hall to Chan or the others. “He acts like he hasn’t known me since we were babes. Like he forgets that I’m married, too.” “He is protective because of the babe,” Felix says quietly. “I’ll talk to him, though. He is being rather silly.” “He’s possessive, not protective.” Mingyu corrects, raising a brow at Felix. “And it’s not the babe, at least not yet. It’s you.”

entry.title: Not Sleeping Causes Hallucinations, but This Train Never Sleeps
entry.summary:
Author: Anushkawantstowrite

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,462Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 7

Summary: The people are afraid of him. They fear that the legend would rise, that the star of all their folk horror tales would appear amongst them. When absurd signs warn them about something unusual, the townsfolk seek the help of the priest. The priest realises that the danger they are about to face cannot be overturned by a mere cross. It's a danger beyond imagination. Armed by the desire to save the people, he sets out on a journey with his disciple. They discover a prophecy. Originally, they do not believe the prophecy to be true. After all, how could the recluse architect of their town be prophesied to control the vampire that would haunt them? Besides, he was quite young. However, when danger inches closer and threatens to obliterate them all, they send the unsuspecting and clueless young architect to the vampire, like a sheep being sent to a lion's den. They do not know quite what to expect, but they surely don't expect the villain to become unnaturally fascinated with his prey. They can never, in their wildest dreams, expect the innocent and naive prey to turn on them and become a gumiho. A game of push-and-pull ensues, and does anyone come out victorious in the end?

entry.title: Not Just An NDA
entry.summary:
Author: delusional_hour

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,942Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 6

Summary: At some point during the show, Rose had bumped Chris's shoulder and apologized. Not much later, while keeping his eyes focused on the stage, Chris reached his hand out and touched Rose’s hand, hoping it came off as an accident. Rose froze when she felt his hand against her own. He definitely lingered more than an accidental bump. Swallowing, Rose extended her fingers and grazed Chris's hand. Rose was still having a hard time wrapping her mind around the fact that these world famous K-Pop idols were the ones to reach out to her. There were already a bunch of what ifs forming in Rose’s mind. Rose had spent the better part of the past few years obsessed with the man beside her and his group. How could she do anything, but take the chance and get to know them.   This is my first fic on AO3 and my first SKZ fic. It started as a "what if" and one shots bounced around with friends, but I decided to actually post it after being told to write it down. This fic will focus on Rose (OC)/ Bang Chan's relationship with some other background relationships.
